pr_title: [volvooncall] Add missing channels and update documentation (#6880)

timeline.message:
[volvooncall] Added channels to the VolvoOnCall binding (#6880)

Added:
- Tyre pressure
- Plugin Hybrid (PHEV) / Twin engine data
- Preclimatization next to Remote heater
- Average speed
- Brake fluid level

Also updated the readme file

Signed-off-by: Arie van der Lee <arie@soleetions.nl>

[volvooncall] Fixed missing data for brake fluid (#6880)

Signed-off-by: Arie van der Lee <arie@soleetions.nl>

timeline.author: clinique

replies.bodyText:
It's a setting in my IntelliJ based on the preferences from the client project in my day job.
If a * import is the preferred way in OH I can change that setting and do a reformat
replies.author: soleetions

replies.bodyText: Yes, I do not remember seeing such import examples in OH
replies.author: clinique

timeline.message:
[volvooncall] Fixed * import and aligned readme table (#6880)

Signed-off-by: leeari <arie.van.der.lee@rabobank.nl>
